patthana17.28:1.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.28:2.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.28:3.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho naadukkhamasukhāya
